description:
小编导读：还在担心电烫伤头发吗？家用小物让你轻松实现自然卷。

BUBBLE WRAP气泡垫子

Dampen your hair, comb well and apply mousse to help the curls take hold. Then, cut off strips of around 2.5 in wide by 6 in long from a roll of bubble wrap. Roll each of these lengthways, and secure with tape. Next, divide hair into small sections and wind each around the improvised ‘rollers’.沾湿头发、梳理妥当、涂上摩丝有助于卷发成型。然后，从一卷气泡垫子上裁剪几条宽2.5、长6（cm）的细条子下来。沿着长边把细条卷起来，然后用胶带固定牢。接着，把头发分成几束，每一缕发束都卷在“小滚轴”上。

Bend up both ends of the bubble wrap until they meet and secure with a rubber band. Repeat for the whole head. Finally，leave overnight - or until hair is dry - then remove.把气泡垫子两头相接，用橡皮筋固定。整头的头发都这样处理。最后，卷着气泡垫过夜，或者等头发干后再取下气泡垫。

COKE CANS可乐罐

Separate dampened hair into wide sections. Take a section of hair and roll an empty can from the ends up towards the scalp. Secure with an elastic band looped lengthways around the can.把湿法分为几束，每束宽一些。取一束头发，从头发末端开始把空罐往上卷至头皮。用橡皮筋绕着罐子把头发箍住。

STRAW SPIRALS螺旋吸管

Hold a plastic straw vertically. Starting with the end of hair and working up to the scalp, wrap a thin section of wet hair around it in a spiral. Bring the ends together and, this time, secure with a kirby grip. 取根吸管，竖着拿。从发尾开始把湿发一圈圈绕上去，一直绕到头皮处。把发尾集中在一起，用发卡固定。

HEADBAND头带

Place a cotton headband horizontally around your head. Divide damp hair into sections, then wind each of these up and around the band.头上绕一圈棉质头带。把湿发分几束，把每一束都绕在发带上。

TIN FOIL锡纸

Cut out some squares of aluminium foil, measuring approximately 4 in by 4 in. Take a strip of hair and, starting at the ends, wind it around two fingers until you have a coil.Slide your fingers out and wrap the coil into a parcel of foil. Scrunch the foil to secure it and leave hair to dry.切几小张铝箔纸下来，大约4*4大小。取一缕头发，从发尾开始，绕在两根手指头上，直到缠成卷。轻轻抽出手指，把发卷包进一团锡纸里。把锡纸揉作一团，固定住，等头发干。
